content:
Nintendo Switch 硬解后 如何安装 塞尔达传说王国之泪Mod大师模式

有什么用

了解 大气层系统 如何安装 塞尔达传说王国之泪Mod大师模式

怎么用

直接打开主页中的塞尔达传说王国之泪图标

相关内容

实现方法/步骤

首先Switch主机必需是硬解后的, 进入大气层虚拟系统

  1. 先安装 The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom 原版的xci文件
    1. TOTK [0100F2C0115B6000][v0].xci
    2. 下载渠道: 磁力链接, 导航到 https://1337x.to/search/Tears+of+the+Kingdom/1/
  2. 安装Update 1.2.1 The Legend of Zelda Tears of the Kingdom Update NSP
    1. The Legend of Zelda Tears of the Kingdom [0100F2C0115B6800][v393216].nsp
    2. 下载渠道: https://romsim.com/the-legend-of-zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom-switch-1w/
  3. 安装Mod
    1. 文件名: challenge_mode_140_recommended_555ee.zip
    2. 下载渠道: https://gamebanana.com/mods/537404#FileInfo_1336442
  4. 安装大师模式Mod步骤:
    1. On Switch hardware
    2. Download the version of the mod that you want. (e.g. if you want the recommended build, download challenge_mode_140_recommended.zip).
    3. In your modded Switch SD Card, navigate to atmosphere\contents\0100F2C0115B6000 and extract the romfs and exefs folders from the mod archive in it.
    4. In your modded Switch SD Card, navigate to atmosphere\contents\0100F2C0115B6000\exefs, locate the IPS file inside, and cut paste it in atmosphere\exefs_patches\Challenge Mode. If that folder doesn’t exist, create it.
  5. 注意事项
    1. 0100F2C0115B6000 这个文件夹如果不存在可以手动创建(放atmosphere\contents\这个目录下方)
    2. 剪切atmosphere\contents\0100F2C0115B6000\exefs, locate the IPS file, 有个IPS文件, 粘贴到atmosphere\exefs_patches\Challenge Mode(文件夹不存在就创建一个)

如果还是搞不定,

请移步闲鱼搜索: 手柄一修哥
